name: OCPIParkingRestriction
description: This value, if provided, represents the restriction to the parking spot for different purposes.

enumValues.name: EV_ONLY
enumValues.description: Reserved parking spot for electric vehicles.

enumValues.name: PLUGGED
enumValues.description: Parking is only allowed while plugged in (charging).

enumValues.name: DISABLED
enumValues.description: Reserved parking spot for disabled people with valid ID.

enumValues.name: CUSTOMERS
enumValues.description: Parking spot for customers/guests only, for example in case of a hotel or shop.

enumValues.name: MOTORCYCLES
enumValues.description: Parking spot only suitable for (electric) motorcycles or scooters.
